title: How to Make Longanisa (Native Filipino Sausages)

steps.headline: Mix all of the ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Roll them at desired shapes and sizes and wrap it in wax paper, if opting for skinless longanisa.

text: Mix all of the ingredients in a mixing bowl.  Roll them at desired shapes and sizes and wrap it in wax paper, if opting for skinless longanisa.  Boil for a few minutes.  Shallow fry and serve.
